about.title: About RegalProp
about.p1: RegalProp is a boutique real estate advisory and operations team based in Kuala Lumpur, focusing on high-value properties within 3–5km of KLCC, TRX and Pavilion.
about.p2: Beyond traditional buy-and-sell, we also operate hospitality units, manage rentals and provide long-term asset planning for owners and investors.

highlights.title: KLCC area focus
highlights.text: Deep specialisation in Star Residences KLCC, Star Suites KLCC and neighbouring landmark projects.

highlights.title: Sale to operation
highlights.text: Involved from project launch, sub-sale transactions, through to daily rental operations and unit maintenance.

highlights.title: Investor mindset
highlights.text: We think in terms of holding power, rental yield, exit strategy and actual demand, not just marketing brochures.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: Share with us your budget, purpose and timeline. We will recommend a few concrete options instead of sending generic broadcasts.

mm2h.title: MM2H & long-stay planning
mm2h.subtitle: High-level overview of how high-value KLCC area properties can fit into your Malaysia My Second Home (MM2H) or long-stay plan.

sections.overviewBody: For many MM2H applicants, the main questions are: where to stay, how much to allocate into property, and how flexible the exit is. We focus on KLCC, TRX and Pavilion area projects that match these requirements.
sections.consultTitle: Talk to us before you commit
sections.consultBody: Instead of rushing into any random project, let us walk you through real numbers on rentability, holding cost and resale demand around KLCC.

education.title: Education & international schools
education.subtitle: Popular school clusters and how they relate to KLCC, TRX, Pavilion, Damansara Heights and other key neighbourhoods.
education.comingSoon: We are mapping school catchment areas to specific buildings. Share your children's age and syllabus and we can propose a few realistic locations.

faq.itemsIntro: Below are some common questions buyers and landlords ask us. For anything more detailed, feel free to WhatsApp our team.

recruitment.title: Recruitment – agents & partners
recruitment.subtitle: We work with a small number of agents who are serious about KLCC area and willing to go deep into a few projects.
joinPoints: Agents who are willing to specialise in a few buildings instead of everywhere.
People who are comfortable with on-ground work: viewing, key handling, unit checks.
Those who want to learn hospitality-style operation for selected units.
recruitment.ctaText: If you feel aligned with this, send us your profile or WhatsApp us for a conversation.
